name: MilCo.
description:
Moo Moo! Conquer the little valley with your cute cows! How To Play && Controls

Controls 

  • WSAD To move camera
  • Click + Hold LMB To place connections between milk factory and house, then house to house
  • Click on Cow statue’s pedestal to buy a moo-moo!
  • Connect all 30 Houses or go bankrupt!
  • Your connections CANNOT be undone!
  • Manage your economy and take care of Moo-moos!
